jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for building interactive, user-friendly web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Develops server-side logic, APIs, and databases to power dynamic web applications, often using Node.js or Python.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Combines frontend and backend skills to create end-to-end solutions, maintaining both client-side and server-side code.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Designs visually appealing and user-centered interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences and intuitive navigation.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Automates software delivery and infrastructure management, ensuring reliable deployment pipelines and scalable systems.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyzes large datasets to extract insights, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Develops and maintains mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms using technologies like Flutter or React Native.

jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
jobs.description: Designs scalable cloud infrastructure solutions using platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
